Enterprise + Innovation Hub

The Enterprise + Innovation Hub is closed until the end of May due to refurbishment.

Ipswich County Library, Northgate Street, Ipswich IP1 3DE · Email hub@suffolklibraries.co.uk to book a space or machine

A fully-equipped space for meetings, presentations, workshops and private study in the heart of Ipswich.

Work, meeting and presentation spaces

Hire the whole Carnegie Room, lounge & presentation suite, Lab or a pod.

Makerspace

Use Raspberry Pi kits and sewing machines in our MakerSpace.

Business advice from New Anglia Growth Hub

Make an appointment for free advice on several aspects of your business.

Code Club

Children aged 6-14 can learn how to code through creative projects.

Contact

Email: hub@suffolklibraries.co.uk
